#Generic form
```{r}
View(geoJSON_map)
library(leaflet)

bins_columnname <- seq(lowest value in column, highest value in the column, number of bins you want)
pal  <- colorBin("YlOrRd", map@data$columnname, bins_columnname)

leaflet(data = geoJSON_map) %>%
  addTiles()        %>%
  addPolygons(fillColor = ~pal(columnname))

```
